overview:
Nick is Co-Founder and President of NickelBus, Inc. He manages day-to-day activity of the company.

Nick loves the convenience of intercity bus travel, and is happy make cost effective travel opportunities available all in one place.

At NickelBus, we’re all about the adventure, and we’re your #1 bus stop.
